attributes.action: All elected officials to use the same border processes for immigration and security as economy class passengers.
attributes.additional_details: Delays at borders are a drag on the productivity of the entire nation because of our dependency on trade and the people (British and visitors) who conduct it. If politicians share the experience of the public it will become clear enough to them that delays are not acceptable. It will also create opportunities for politicians to meet and talk with members of the public in an environment that should guarantee their personal safety. My assumption is this can be implemented overnight by executive order at no new cost to the taxpayer.
